title: Simple harmonic motion - example of SHM

content.question: Which of the following types of motion could be described as simple harmonic motion?

choices.label: An ice cube sliding down one side of a curved bowl, past the bottom and back up the other side
A ball rolling down a ramp and back up another ramp where the angle of both ramps with the vertical is the same
A cart sliding back and forth on a surface while attached to a spring
A dropped ball that collides elastically with the floor and returns to its initial height

content.answer: A cart sliding back and forth on a surface while attached to a spring
